        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 781x72
          text run at (0,0) width 777: "This means the first column should be 50 pixels wide. The remaining width should be divided among the three remaining"
          text run at (0,18) width 781: "columns according to the proportional width statements into six (2+1+3) parts. Since the Table is 350 pixels wide, and the"
          text run at (0,36) width 760: "remaining width is 300 pixels (350-50), the remaining columns should be 100 (2*50), 50 (1*50) and 150 (3*50) pixels"
          text run at (0,54) width 40: "wide, "
          text run at (39,54) width 81: "respectively."
